RFI Detection and Flagging¶

Module for detecting and flaging RFI related effects.

aipy.rfi.fit_gaussian(xs, ys)¶
Fit a gaussian (returning amplitude, sigma, offset) to a set of x values and their corresponding y values.
aipy.rfi.flag_by_int(preflagged_auto, nsig=1, raw=False)¶
Flag RFI for an autocorrelation. Iteratively removes outliers and fits a smooth passband, then uses smooth passband to remove outliers (both positive and negative). If ‘raw’ is specified, no smooth function is removed.
aipy.rfi.gaussian(amp, sig, off, x)¶
Generate gaussian value at x given amplitude (amp), sigma (sig), and x offset.
aipy.rfi.gen_rfi_thresh(data, nsig=2, cnt_per_bin=1000)¶
Generate a threshold at nsig times the standard deviation (above and below) the mean, outside of which data are considered RFI.
aipy.rfi.remove_spikes(data, mask=None, order=6, iter=3, return_poly=False)¶
Iteratively fits a smooth function by removing outliers and fitting a polynomial, then using the polynomial to remove other outliers.
